series: Amsterdam studies in the theory and history of linguistic science. Series iv, Current issues in linguistic theory, issn 0304-0763 -- v. 304
subtitle: selected papers from the 37th Linguistic Symposium on Romance Languages (LSRL), Pittsburgh, March 2007
title: Romance languages-- structure, interfaces, and microparametric variation
by_statement: edited by Pascual José Masullo, Erin O'Rourke, Chia-Hui Huang.
